w: He did not refuse to confess
I will raise it up again
are going to raise it up
has placed His seal of approval
called out in a loud voice
of [a man] possessed by a demon
will You keep us in suspense
[ then what about the One ] whom
this is doing you no good
As soon as he had received
they would not be guilty of sin
they would not be guilty of sin
we would not have handed Him over
you do not want to go
